meanings.definition: A fit of laughter or anger that occurs in water.
meanings.sent1: During the pool party, Sarah got the aquafits and couldn't stop laughing.
meanings.sent2: The aquafits took over Tim when he accidentally splashed water on his friend.
meanings.sent3: The aquafits hit Bobby when he saw his dog trying to swim for the first time.
meanings.sent4: The aquafits bubbled up inside Mary as she watched the hilarious water balloon fight.
meanings.sent5: The aquafits made everyone at the water park burst into laughter uncontrollably.

meanings.definition: A group fitness class that takes place in a pool.
meanings.sent1: Joining the aquafits class helped Lisa improve her swimming skills.
meanings.sent2: The aquafits session was a fun way for the seniors to stay active and socialize.
meanings.sent3: The aquafits instructor made the class so enjoyable that everyone forgot they were exercising.
meanings.sent4: The aquafits program splashed excitement into the community pool.
meanings.sent5: The aquafits workout left everyone feeling refreshed and energized.
